name: Heroism and Love in the Middle Ages
description: A close reading of selected French literary texts from the 12th to the 15th century. Masterpieces of narrative prose of the French Middle Ages will be studied with emphasis on the social and political background of the time. Selected texts may include epic poems such as 'The Song of Roland' and Arthurian romances such as 'Tristan' and 'Perceval'. Most readings will be done in modern French translation, short texts will be studied in the original Old French with a discussion of the evolution of the language. [12L, 12T]
prerequisites: FRE240H5, FRE241H5 (or FRE240Y5), FRE280Y5 or a minimum grade of 77% in FSL406H5 or equivalent.
